alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 11:33PM EDT until August 15 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Russell County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southeastern Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 1132 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Walnut Hill, or 11 miles northwest of Bristol Va, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Walnut Hill, Colonial Heights, Spurgeon, Bluff City, Nickelsville, Tri-City Airport and Blountville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 58 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 8. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington
